name: MAKE BETTER USE
bulletPoients: People can sell and buy used cameras after signup and sellers can add and delete products.
Admin can delete seller, buyer, and reported products and verify sellers. Users can report a product to the admin.
Implemented features like Advertisements, Payment gateway, CRUD operations, JWT token verification, and different routes for users, sellers, and admin.
Implemented features like updating/deleting reviews, Sign up, Sign in, Google Sign in, and Sign Out. Authentication was handled using Firebase.

name: FLYTOGRAPHER
bulletPoients: Firebase authentication, Course details pdf, and by clicking course cards user will be redirected to the course details page.
Users can Sign in and Sign up using email and password, and Sign out. Users can also Sign in with google and GitHub.
Responsive and well-designed for both mobile and desktop. Implemented a private route so that users can not visit the checkout route before Sign-in.
Implemented features like updating/deleting reviews, Sign up, Sign in, Google Sign in, and Sign Out. Authentication was handled using Firebase.
